abstract: Miami Dolphins sign former University of Mississippi offensive tackle Laremy Tunsil to four-year, $12.45 million contract.
lead_paragraph: Tunsil, an offensive tackle from the University of Mississippi, signed a $12.45 million contract. He was taken 13th in the draft after a video was posted on his Twitter account showing drug use.

headline.main: Dolphins Sign Laremy Tunsil After Draft Free Fall
headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Football; Dolphins Sign Tunsil

snippet: Tunsil, an offensive tackle from the University of Mississippi, signed a $12.45 million contract. He was taken 13th in the draft after a video was posted on his Twitter account showing drug use.
